description:
Now you can play a kalimba on your Palm Pre! This 8-note kalimba is great for children and beginners of all ages. Kalimbas, also known as  thumb pianos, are pleasant sounding and are fun to play. Anyone can create happy tunes with a kalimba. Just tap the "keys" with your thumbs -- that's all there is to it! This 8-note kalimba sounds best with earphones or though external speakers. Have fun!

When you gain some experience, try our "Kalimba Fun" app (also free). "Kalimba Fun" is a 15-note kalimba.
